code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Container,Row,Col,ListGroup,Button,Offcanvas,Form}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import SimsService from'../services/sims';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MatchList(){const[games,setGames]=useState([]);const[show,setShow]=useState(false);const[sport,setSport]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{SimsService.getGames(sport).then(setGames);},[sport]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"pb-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"align-items-center mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-0 fw-semibold",children:"Today\u2019s Games"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:"auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>setShow(true),children:"Filters"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{children:games.map(g=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListGroup.Item,{className:"game-item d-flex justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[g.away," @ ",g.home]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/game/${g._id}`,className:"btn btn-primary btn-sm ms-2",children:"Run Simulation"})]},g._id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Offcanvas,{show:show,onHide:()=>setShow(false),placement:"end",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Offcanvas.Header,{closeButton:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Offcanvas.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Select,{value:sport,onChange:e=>setSport(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"All sports"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"NBA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"NFL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"SOC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"TEN"})]})})]})]});}export default MatchList;
